contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 26, 2009 D Swiss Open
Swiss Open 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
swiss-open
Swiss Open Contest presented nearly 50 different Bands from 11 Countries in it's 25 Years of History till 2014. It was held in Kultur-Casino Bern first and since 1999 the 'Salle Blanche' in KKL Luzern provides a wonderful Frame for this popular Event.
See Also Contest Website: http://www.worldbandfestival.ch/ Switzerland
Set Test and Own Choice
Reflection of Colours
Kultur und Kongresszentrum (KKL), Luzern, Switzerland 20th Edition
Best performance of contest march: Brass Band Burgermusik Luzern Best Own Choice: Brass Band Luzerner Hinterland
Oct. 2, 2009, 8:57 p.m. Aug. 18, 2015, 2:55 p.m.
1 Brassband Bürgermusik Luzern Michael Bach Le Roi d'Ys
2 Ensemble de Cuivres Valaisan Jean-François Bobillier The Thievish Magpie (La Gazza Ladra) [arr. D. Wright]
3 Brass Band Berner Oberland Phillip McCann Freischütz Overture [arr. Wüthrich]
4 Brass Band Treize Etoiles James Gourlay The Flying Dutchman [arr. Lorriman]
5 Wallberg Brass Band Russell Gray The Force of Destiny (La Forza del Destino) - Overture [arr. F. Wright]
6 Ensemble de Cuivres Melodia Yvan Lagger Festival Overture [Shostakovitch]
7 Brass Band Fribourg Vincent Baroni
8 Brass Band Luzern Land Herve Grelat Night on a Bare Mountain [Modest Mussorgsky]
9 Oberaargauer Brass Band Armin Renggli
10 Entlebucher Brass Band Philippe Bach
